sentences.sContent: birds pecking at breadcrumbs on the pavement
sentences.sCn: 在人行道上啄食面包屑的鸟儿

sentences.sContent: A bird had pecked a hole in the sack.
sentences.sCn: 一只鸟把袋子啄了个洞。

synos.tran: 许多；配克（容量单位，等于2加仑）；啄痕

phrases.pCn: n. 格里高利·派克（美国男影星）

words.tran: 啄木鸟；鹤嘴锄；穿孔器；精神；阴茎

trans.tranOther: (of birds) to move the beak forward quickly and hit or bite sth
